entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
